description: Detects tampering with autologger trace sessions which is a technique used by attackers to disable logging
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential AutoLogger Sessions Tampering
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\[Ww][Mm][Ii]\\[Aa][Uu][Tt][Oo][Ll][Oo][Gg][Gg][Ee][Rr]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ll][Oo][Gg]\-.*/ OR /.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr].*/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000000\)/) AND (NOT process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Ee][Vv][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
